meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7793.

td.p: Scott McFadden, a librarian from Muncie, Indiana
Amy Goodchild, a library youth services associate from Morton Grove, Illinois
Andrew King, a lawyer from Little Rock, Arkansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $1,198)

tr.td: THE HERO'S JOURNEY
CRAFTS & HOBBIES
ALLUSIONS
WAY BACK IN THE '60s, MAN
A LITTLE MISTAKE
MAKING A FEDERAL CASE OUT OF IT
